snippet: The announcement of Mayor Klaus Wowereit’s resignation from the board came as the project’s opening was pushed back for a fifth time.
abstract: Berlin Mayor Klaus Wowereit announces that he will quit as head of board overseeing construction of Berlin-Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport after project's opening is pushed back for fifth time; delays--latest caused by faulty fire safety system--have dented Germany's shiny image as efficient industrial powerhouse driven by superior technical know-how and have become the butt of jokes among Berlin residents.
lead_paragraph: The announcement of Mayor Klaus Wowereit’s resignation from the board came as the project’s opening was pushed back for a fifth time.

headline.seo: Official to Leave Panel Overseeing Delayed Berlin Airport
headline.main: Mayor to Leave Panel Overseeing Delayed Berlin Airport
headline.print_headline: Berlin Mayor Quits Panel Overseeing New Airport
